trans-unit.source: Represents an agreement between parts that allows the composition engine to match imports with exports.
trans-unit.target: 表示組件之間的合約，可讓組合引擎比對匯入與匯出。

trans-unit.source: The contract type.
trans-unit.target: 合約類型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositionContract" /> class with the specified contract type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的合約型別，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositionContract" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The contract type.
trans-unit.target: 合約類型。

trans-unit.source: The contract name.
trans-unit.target: 合約名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositionContract" /> class with the specified contract name and type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的合約名稱和型別，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositionContract" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The contract type.
trans-unit.target: 合約類型。

trans-unit.source: The contract name.
trans-unit.target: 合約名稱。

trans-unit.source: A collection of metadata constraints for the contract.
trans-unit.target: 合約的中繼資料限制式集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositionContract" /> class with the specified contract name, type, and metadata constraints.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的合約名稱、類型和中繼資料限制式，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositionContract" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The new contract type.
trans-unit.target: 新的合約類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new contract that has the specified type but the same name and constraints as this object.
trans-unit.target: 建立具有指定之類型，但名稱及限制式與此物件相同的新合約。

trans-unit.source: The created contract.
trans-unit.target: 建立的合約。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the contract.
trans-unit.target: 取得合約的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The contract name.
trans-unit.target: 合約名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the contract type.
trans-unit.target: 取得合約類型。

trans-unit.source: The contract type.
trans-unit.target: 合約類型。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with this object.
trans-unit.target: 要與這個物件比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to this instance of <see cref="T:System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositionContract" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的物件是否等於這個 <see cref="T:System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositionContract" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified object is equal to the current object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的物件等於目前的物件，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositionContract" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此 <see cref="T:System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositionContract" /> 物件的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of metadata constraints for the contract.
trans-unit.target: 取得合約的中繼資料限制式集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of metadata constraints.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料限制式的集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of this <see cref="T:System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositionContract" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此 <see cref="T:System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositionContract" /> 物件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of this <see cref="T:System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositionContract" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Composition.Hosting.Core.CompositionContract" /> 物件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The type of the metadata constraint value.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料限制式值的類型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the metadata constraint.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料限制式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the value of the constraint if it was found.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含限制式的值 (如果找到的話)。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is treated as uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會被視為未初始化。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, holds the contract with the constraint removed, if the constraint was found.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會保留已移除限制式的合約 (如果找到限制式的話)。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is treated as uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會被視為未初始化。

trans-unit.source: Gets a metadata constraint that has the specified type and name, if it exists.
trans-unit.target: 取得具有指定之類型及名稱的中繼資料限制式 (如果存在的話)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the constrained metadata item was unwrapped and the value extracted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若中繼資料項目已解除裝且值已擷取，即為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。
